actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

actions.subcommittee: Africa, Global Human Rights and International Operations
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa, Global Human Rights and International Operations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Africa, Global Human Rights and International Operations

official_title: To provide that no Federal funds may be used for the design, renovation, construction, or rental of any headquarters for the United Nations in any location in the United States unless the President transmits to Congress a certification that the United Nations has adopted internationally-recognized best practices in contracting and procurement.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of federal funds for the design, renovation, construction, or rental of any U.N. headquarters in the United States unless the President transmits to Congress a certification that the United Nations has adopted internationally-recognized best practices in contracting and procurement.

titles.title: To provide that no Federal funds may be used for the design, renovation, construction, or rental of any headquarters for the United Nations in any location in the United States unless the President transmits to Congress a certification that the United Nations has adopted internationally-recognized best practices in contracting and procurement.
